verses.roman:
daṇḍavat haiyā āmi paḍinu pāyete
nija-pāda-padma prabhu dilā mora māthe

synonyms: daṇḍavat haiyā—offering obeisances; āmi—I; paḍinu—fell down; pāyete—at His lotus feet; nija-pāda-padma—His own lotus feet; prabhu—the Lord; dilā—placed; mora—my; māthe—on the head.
translation: I fell at His feet, offering my obeisances, and He then placed His own lotus feet upon my head.
